slides.title: Hydrogen charging station map
slides.desc: Created an interactive and responsive map, for m.hyundaiusa.com, showing locations of hydrogen charing stations in california, as well as ones in development

slides.title: Vehicle listing page
slides.desc: Created the vehicle listing page for vehicle pricing for m.hyundaiusa.com, this was later turned into a template to be used for all vehicles

slides.title: NFL countdown timer
slides.desc: Built a custom timer that counted down to the 2015 NFL kickoff for hyundaiusa.com

slides.title: Android Auto page
slides.desc: Built the interactive Android Auto page for desktop and mobile, which showcased the Android Auto technology used in some of the vehicles. Includes Application Program Interface implementation using the YouTube API.

slides.title: Sonata Plugin Hybrid page
slides.desc: Built the interactive page showcasing the Sonata Plugin Hybrid, Application Program Inteface implementations, using the Google Maps API, and the YouTube API. This page also made AJAX requests to our .NET REST API.

slides.title: Hyundaiusa.com NCAA page
slides.desc: Built the interactive NCAA page, where people could download wallpapers of there favorite teams, share the page on social media, share the wallpapers on twitter or instagram, and also sign up to recieve a team cling. This page made AJAX requests to a .NET REST API.
